about_the_game:
Colorful is a parkour hack-n-slash where you must restore color to the world. You play as Jonah, a young man that wakes up in an unknown lifeless world where strange dark creatures have consumed its color. Glide, wall run, and grind your way through a dreamlike landscape while battling the dark enemies that have consumed the color of the world! Experience Jonah’s personal story while discovering the secrets behind the darkness!



  • Experience a unique blend of parkour movement with hack-n-slash gameplay!
  • A unique movement system for total freedom and fluidity!



  • Fast-paced hack-n-slash combat!
  • Use your magic brush to unleash color powers to face the darkness



  • Traverse a dreamlike landscape with colorful environments!
  • See how a dying world is brought back to life when the color returns!



  • Experience Jonah’s deeply personal story of self-discovery
  • Discover the untold secret of this world
  • Fight a variety of dark enemies each with its own challenge
  • Recolor the world! The more you paint the world the stronger your color powers become!
